info.title: Radio & Music Services
info.description: We encapsulate Radio & Music business logic for iPlayer Radio and BBC Music products on all platforms. We add value by reliably providing the right blend of metadata needed by clients.

parameters.name: on_air
parameters.description: Filter what is on air. E.g. 'now' returns current programme being broadcasted.

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Filter what will be on air next in minutes. E.g. '240' returns programmes broadcasted in the next four hours

parameters.name: previous
parameters.description: Filter what was on air previously in minutes. E.g. '240' returns programmes broadcasted in the previous four hours

get.description:
List of favourited episodes and clips for a given user for iPlayer Radio.

N.B.  Swagger schemas cannot currently handle multiple combinations of object in an array i.e. a mix of Episode
and Clip Summaries so we are defining data as a Programme Summary here.  This will be resolved in V3 with full support for
 anyOf https://www.openapis.org/blog/2017/01/24/a-new-year-a-new-specification

put.description:
Update user favourites

N.B. Any HTML tags submitted in metadata will be removed

X-forwarded-for.name: X-forwarded-for
X-forwarded-for.description: IP of the requester (REQUIRED). The IPs addresses that follow belong to various proxies the request may have gone through (ignored).

X-international-experience-name.name: X-international-experience-name
X-international-experience-name.description: Internationalisation request type. Domestic and International are valid experience names. Unknown acts as a marker that you want an appropriate experience but don't know which one. Not providing this header will give a domestic experience.

experience.name: experience
experience.description: Flag to indicate an Experience name to influence the response, for specific features (e.g. Internationalisation)

tag-enabled.name: tag_enabled
tag-enabled.description: Flag to indicate that "tags" may be surfaced in the response (default false)

hero_enabled.name: hero_enabled
hero_enabled.description: Set to True for hero category response

BroadcastService.name: service
BroadcastService.description: Filter by Service ID. E.g. bbc_radio_fourfm

BroadcastSort.name: sort
BroadcastSort.description: Sort by provided query. E.g. 'start_at' sorts in ascending order, and '-start_at' sorts in descending order

date.name: date
date.description: ISO 8601 Date yyyy-mm-dd.  Returns items in the given date

CategoryKind.name: kind
CategoryKind.description: Filter by provided query. E.g. 'promoted' returns promoted categories

network.name: network
network.description: Filter by network master brand ID (mid). Accepts comma separated values

networkUrlKey.name: network_url_key
networkUrlKey.description: Filter by network URL key. Accepts comma separated values

category.name: category
category.description: Filter by category id. Accepts comma separated values.

parent.name: parent
parent.description: Filter by parent. Accepts any brand or series pid

container.name: container
container.description: Filter by container. Accepts any brand or series pid

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Sort by provided query. E.g. 'available_from_date' sorts in ascending order, and '-available_from_date' sorts in descending order

tleoDistinct.name: tleoDistinct
tleoDistinct.description: Filter by latest playable items from distinct tleo containers

since.name: since
since.description: ISO 8601 Date yyyy-mm-dd.  Returns items between given time period and now

until.name: until
until.description: ISO 8601 Date yyyy-mm-dd.  Returns items between given 'since' and 'until' date params

decomposed.name: decomposed
decomposed.description: In addition to the overall score, return a list of scores broken down by day N.B Must be used in conjunction with since and/or until and since is >= 31 days

MusicNetwork.name: network
MusicNetwork.description: Return items with given Network ID

rights.name: rights
rights.description: Only return available results for the web/mobile.

experiment-scope.name: scope
experiment-scope.description: Only return experiments within the specified scope.

experiment-platform.name: platform
experiment-platform.description: Only return experiments configured for the specified platform.

description.example: Radio 3's Composer of the Week series

InternalServiceError.description: There is an internal service error

Unauthorized.description: Authorization token is invalid or Expired

GatewayTimeout.description: server error response code indicates that the server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, did not get a response in time from the upstream server that it needed in order to complete the request.

BadGateway.description: server error response code indicates that the server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, received an invalid response from the upstream server.

schema.example: The request has been accepted for processing, but the processing has not been completed.

tags.name: Programmes - Internal Use
tags.description: Programmes endpoints designed for internal use pre-migration, do not use them directly to query metadata for Sounds
